properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 --1분 미만 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24*60*60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 -- 1시간 미만 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24*60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 -- 하루 미만 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT)*24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE "BOARD" SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT_VIEWS, ENROLL_DATE FROM BOARD AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'

UPDATE TABLE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
